projects.title: Development of a Drunk Identifier Using Smartphone HRM Sensor

projects.title: Development of Wearable Mouse Using Inertial Sensors

projects.title: Creating a music genre Classifier through multi-dimensional entropy analysis
projects.note: As a team leader, by defining various entropy and applying it to machine learning, the music genre Classifieris produced with the best-learned model.

projects.title: Hand coding in Hangeul
